mapper.update: update sea_guestbook set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, posttime = #{posttime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtime = #{dtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ischeck = #{ischeck,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, uid, title, mid, posttime, uname, ip, dtime, ischeck, msg from sea_guestbook
